content:
Hello,

I am trying to validate sample xml for a patient resource on the FHIR server using the following command:

http://fhir3.healthintersections.com.au/open/Patient/6f701696-fbfc-4cb0-9c6e-868db95814/$validate?profile=http:  //hl7.org/fhir/us/daf/StructureDefinition/daf-core-patient

However, the server is returning the following error:

 <div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
        <p>Unknown StructureDefinition http://hl7.org/fhir/us/daf/StructureDefinition/daf-core-patient</p>
    </div>

Does anyone know what the correct site is for the DAF profiles for the current build?

Thank you,

DAF-Patient_Example.zip
my server doesn't have DAF loaded right now, because when I did the build for that version, DAF wasn't building

Thank you @Grahame Grieve for the quick response.

I will re-test on your server once DAF is loaded. For now, I will use http://fhirtest.uhn.ca/baseDstu3.

Cheers,

Meenaxi
